Class RegistrationController

java.lang.Object
RegistrationController
All Implemented Interfaces:
RegistrationServiceInterface
public class RegistrationController extends Object implements RegistrationServiceInterface
Implementation of registration services.

This class implements the RegistrationServiceInterface, providing user registration and approval logic with loose coupling.

Version:
1.0

    • registerCompanyRepresentative

      public boolean registerCompanyRepresentative(String name, String email, String companyName, String department, String position, String password)
      Description copied from interface: RegistrationServiceInterface
      Registers a new Company Representative.
      Specified by:
      registerCompanyRepresentative in interface RegistrationServiceInterface
      Parameters:
      name - representative's name
      email - company email (used as User ID)
      companyName - name of the company
      department - department within company
      position - job position
      password - initial password
      Returns:
      true if registration successful, false otherwise

    • approveRepresentative

      Description copied from interface: RegistrationServiceInterface
      Approves a pending Company Representative account.
      Specified by:
      approveRepresentative in interface RegistrationServiceInterface
      Parameters:
      staff - the staff member performing the approval
      rep - the representative to approve
      Returns:
      true if approval successful, false otherwise

    • changePassword

      public boolean changePassword(String userId, String oldPassword, String newPassword)
      Description copied from interface: RegistrationServiceInterface
      Changes a user's password.
      Specified by:
      changePassword in interface RegistrationServiceInterface
      Parameters:
      userId - the user ID (student ID or email for company representatives)
      oldPassword - current password for verification
      newPassword - new password to set
      Returns:
      true if password changed successfully, false otherwise
